QuestData.Title: Taste Test
QuestData.Description: As long as you're here, you might as well help me out. I'm feeling pretty darn unqualified for the task, seeing as I've never drank a drop of beer in my life.$b$bYou should try a little sample of each of their grains. Let's see if any of this stuff is sweet enough for Uncle Chen.
QuestData.LogDescription: Taste the Aged Grain, Light Grain, Fresh Grain, and Malted Grain.
QuestData.CompletionText: None of this seems to taste sweet enough! What's the deal?
QuestData.RewardText: Huh. I guess none of that grain is going to work. Uncle Chen is pretty picky.$b$bMaybe the Grainlord knows where we can find something more... special.
